HomePage.subtitle: CROUStillant allows you to consult the menus of CROUS restaurants in France and overseas.

RestaurantCard.accessibility: Accessibility for people with reduced mobility

presentation.title: Made by students, for students...
presentation.description: CROUStillant is a project that aims to provide information on the menus of university restaurants in France and overseas.

updates.title: Hot dishes, always.
updates.description: CROUStillant scans the entire menus of CROUS restaurants several times a day to provide you with always up-to-date and reliable information.

open-source.title: Free & 100% open-source!
open-source.description: CROUStillant is an entirely open-source and free project. You can view the project's source code on GitHub and contribute to its development if you wish.

product.title: Simple, intuitive and accessible
product.description: CROUStillant is a simple and intuitive platform that allows you to access the menus of CROUS restaurants in France and overseas. The platform is accessible to all and does not require any registration.

features.feature2: Search by region, city or establishment

team.title: The team
team.description: The CROUStillant team is made up of passionate volunteers. We work together to make the information of CROUS restaurants more accessible and readable.

discord.title: Available on Discord
discord.description: Add our official Discord bot to your server to check the menus of CROUS restaurants directly on Discord!

integrated.title: Integrate CROUS data
integrated.description: You can integrate CROUS data directly into your own projects using our API. The API is free and open-source.

convinced.title: Convinced?
convinced.description: Discover the menus of CROUS restaurants in France and overseas with CROUStillant!

more-convinced.title: Even more convinced?
more-convinced.description: Join our Discord server to chat with other users and the CROUStillant team!

Footer.authors: Made with ‚ù§Ô∏è by the CROUStillant D√©veloppement team.
Footer.legal: CROUStillant is not affiliated with the "CROUS". CROUStillant is a non-profit project.

copy.toastDescription: You can now paste the image wherever you want.

NotFoundPage.title: 404 - No fish here!
NotFoundPage.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

Common.reportIssueDescription: If you encounter a problem with the platform, you can report it to the development team.
Common.reportIssueSuccess: The issue has been successfully reported. Thank you for your feedback!
Common.reportIssueError: An error occurred while reporting the issue. Please try again later.

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose the language in which you want to use the website.
language.successDescription: The language of the website has been successfully changed.

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Choose the theme you want to use on the website.

favorites.title: Favorites
favorites.description: Manage your favorite restaurants and access their menus at the click of a button.
favorites.noFavoritesDescription: You have not added any restaurant to your favorites yet. To add a restaurant to your favorites, go to the <restaurant>restaurant page</restaurant> and click on the heart icon next to the restaurant name.
favorites.starredDescription: The button on the home page takes you directly to the menu of your favorite restaurant.
favorites.starredEditSuccessDescription: The favorite restaurant has been successfully changed.
favorites.regionDescription: Choose your favorite region to display the restaurants of this region by default.
favorites.regionEditSuccessDescription: The favorite region has been successfully changed.

personal.deleteDataDescription: Delete all your favorites and settings. This action is irreversible.
personal.deleteDataSuccessDescription: All your data has been successfully deleted.

seo.title: Settings - CROUStillant
seo.description: Configure your settings on CROUStillant to personalize your experience.

ideas.title: You have a cool statistic idea?
ideas.description: You have a cool idea for a statistic that you would like to see on CROUStillant? Let us know on our Discord server!

StatsPage.title: Statistics
StatsPage.description: Discover the statistics of CROUStillant and its use by users.
